ModMetaData.name: Rimhammer - Any One Can Dwarf
ModMetaData.author: SickBoyWI
ModMetaData.description:
This mod is a patch for the Rimhammer - The End Times - Dwarfs mod.
It removes race restrictions on all dawi buildings, and recipes. Therefore, it allows any RimWorld pawn with the required skill and skill level to build dawi stuff, or complete dawi recipes.
This can safely be added to an ongoing game.
Load this after the Rimhammer - The End Times - Dwarfs mod.
If you'd like to speed up the process of release, please consider supporting me on Patreon. The more support I get, the more motivated I will be to create more races/factions. https://www.patreon.com/SickBoyWI
Buy me a coffee if you'd prefer to support me that way: https://ko-fi.com/sickboywi
